edu.ncsu.csc216.androtech.model.devices

Interface Prioritizable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComDevice, Device, VRDevice

    public interface Prioritizable
    Public interface used to determine the priority of a device in the waiting list based on its tier.
    Version:
    1.0 (March 19, 2015)
    Author:
    Adams Ombonga (amombong)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareToTier(Prioritizable priority)
      Method used to determine if the device being added is of higher or lower tier then the device before it
      int getTier()
      Gets the tier of the selected device.

    • Method Detail

      • getTier

        int getTier()
        Gets the tier of the selected device.
        Returns:
        integer representing this device's tier

      • compareToTier

        int compareToTier(Prioritizable priority)
        Method used to determine if the device being added is of higher or lower tier then the device before it
        Parameters:
        priority - Object representing the device to be compared against
        Returns:
        zero if the two items match or a negative number if they don't match
